result.name: Exhibit 31: Sustained Coalitions’ Current Perceptions of Sustainability

row1.item: Currently, your coalition has leaders who are continually planning for sustainability. (n=109)

row2.item: Currently, your coalition identifies alternative strategies for project survival. (n=112)

row3.item: Currently, your coalition has sufficient funding for current project activities and operations. (n=113)

row4.item: Currently, your coalition has sufficient funding for the next year. (n=113)

row5.item: Currently, your coalition has sufficient funding for the long-term (2 or more years). (n=112)

row6.item: Currently, your coalition has sufficient funding for hiring and retaining quality staff. (n=112)
